version_description: Improvements and support for multiple languages
Fixes and improvements
Fixes and a new app icon
Fixes and a new app icon

- 100+ hilarious pre-recorded audio clips!
- Brand new look and feel
Voice slider back by popular demand! Change the speed and pitch of your pet's voice with two shiny new sliders.

Thanks for all the feedback, version 6.0 is now ready!
- More focus on recording your own clips
- Voice change sliders more accessible
- Manage your pets more easily
- Brand new look and feel
Fixes and a new app icon

- Magnifying glass fix
- Showing numbers for voice controls
- Fixes for longer videos
- Lots of other small improvements

- NEW easy access to photo albums (thanks for your feedback!)
- Lots of other small improvements

Each pet now keeps its own audio clip, no more accidental over-writing!
Easily change the cropping on photos from your gallery
Lots of other bug fixes and improvements!
Various fixes to improve the quality and reliability of recordings

+ Support for 'Featured Pets' - you can now choose to share your pet with the world!
+ Lots of small fixes and improvements

Introducing ‘Copy-Cat’ (or Copy-Dog/Rabbit/Hamster...!): Your pet can now copy your facial expressions and head movements. Add extra expression and fun in your talking pet videos! Available on iPhone X and newer.
Improvements for the face mirroring. Bug fixes and improvements

Wrap your pet videos in seasonal envelopes!
Lots of small fixes and improvements

- Added valentine's day envelopes
- Improvements for face mirroring
- Improvements for face setup
- Fixed an issue some users faced with the Today widget

New and improved Help Center, and other fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements
Introducing automatic face detection for both pets and humans!
Bug fixes and improvements
Accessories incoming!! Crown your pet with regal glory. Snap them with their party hat. More than 20 hats, glasses, mustaches to choose from in this major update

Turn your pet into a Talking Reindeer this Christmas. We've added a bunch of Xmas accessories to lighten the mood.
